Vietnam, Philippines seal deals on South China Sea security, riceVietnam and the Philippines agreed on Tuesday to boost cooperation among their coastguards and to prevent untoward incidents in the South China Sea, in an announcement during a state visit by President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:54:16 GMT KLJJFXA7EJMHFKDPXUWFW7SPBI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/vietnam-philippines-seal-deals-south-china-sea-security-2024-01-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Hong Kong leaders start legislative push to tighten national security lawsHong Kong's leader confirmed on Tuesday his intention to pass fresh national security laws soon to build on sweeping legislation Beijing imposed on the city in 2020, saying the city has the constitutional responsibility to impose the new laws. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:18:18 GMT GMDHVRQJYZLDLC752YVPL7BH4Y https://www.reuters.com/world/china/hong-kong-leaders-start-legislative-push-tighten-national-security-laws-2024-01-30/Jessie Pang, Greg Torode世界中国
North Korea fires cruise missiles into sea, South Korea saysNorth Korea fired multiple unidentified cruise missiles on Tuesday into the sea off its west coast, South Korea's military said, marking the third time Pyongyang has tested cruise missiles in less than a week. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 02:09:58 GMT XAAGKS2MRFP6VPIDVLXHDRMC7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/north-korea-fires-cruise-missiles-into-sea-south-korea-says-2024-01-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Shark attacks woman swimming in Sydney HarbourA woman swimmer was seriously injured in a shark attack in Sydney Harbour and had been taken to the hospital in a stable condition, authorities said on Tuesday. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 01:18:17 GMT LIGNEUS3HRKZ3OM5PKQ5H3QWOE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/shark-attacks-woman-swimming-sydney-harbour-2024-01-30/Reuters世界亚太地区
Russian shelling kills four in northern Ukraine, one in devastated AvdiivkaRussian shelling in northern Ukraine killed four people in two villages in Sumy region near the Russian border, while a woman died in a fresh assault on the devastated eastern Ukrainian town of Avdiivka, local officials said. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 01:00:33 GMT ZF5V2WUCCNMVLCVNDACJD7AAO4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-shelling-kills-four-northern-ukraine-one-devastated-avdiivka-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
British Columbia to pause approvals of new colleges seeking to enroll foreign studentsBritish Columbia will stop approvals of new colleges seeking to enroll international students until February 2026, the government of the Canadian province said on Monday. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 00:59:47 GMT U7IGZDXPIBKMDFZ7KC7BI4MZW4 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/british-columbia-pause-approvals-new-colleges-seeking-enroll-foreign-students-2024-01-30/Reuters世界美洲
UK minister says any move to seize frozen Russian assets must be 'legally watertight'British investment minister Dominic Johnson said he discussed the seizure of frozen Russian assets with U.S. Deputy Treasury Secretary Wally Adeyemo on Monday, and stressed that any move to do so must be done in strict accordance with international law. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 00:58:14 GMT EDQE6JHU3JMZZISJM5PF6NZT24 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk-minister-says-any-move-seize-frozen- Russian-assets-must-be-legally-watertight-2024-01-30/Andrea Shalal世界
Second man jailed in Moldova's 'fraud of the century'A Moldovan court jailed a banker for 10 years on Monday, the second man to be sentenced in connection with the ex-Soviet state's "fraud of the century" in which $1 billion was removed from the banking system and taken out of the country. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:40:17 GMT CNRUZHZRRFL5RLKS4URIGI4JCM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/second-man-jailed-moldovas-fraud- century-2024-01-29/Alexander Tanas世界欧洲
Youngest US soldier killed in Jordan drone attack was 23The U.S. military on Monday released the names of the three Army Reserve soldiers killed in Sunday's drone attack by Iran-backed militants in Jordan, with the youngest victim just 23 years old. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:18:55 GMT QBJEWZZ2H5MBLK2BKUQR3VUCUY https://www.reuters.com/world/youngest-us-soldier-killed-jordan-drone-attack-was-23-2024-01-29/Reuters世界
Complaint alleges Harvard didn't protect pro-Palestinian students from threatsOver a dozen students alleged on Monday that Harvard University failed to protect them from harassment and threats "based solely" on their pro-Palestinian identity, the group representing them said. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 22:17:12 GMT V5KXPRFTNNNMJCUCP3F2FCCUNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/complaint-alleges-harvard-didnt-protect-pro-palestinian-students-threats-2024-01-29/Kanishka Singh世界
Peru protests block access to Machu Picchu, stranding touristsProtests in Peru are blocking access to Machu Picchu, one of South America's most popular heritage sites, with local anger over a new ticketing system halting rail transport to the iconic Incan site and leaving some tourists stranded. Mon, 29 Jan 2024 21:22:48 GMT 3XIMATKAAVMKBIUULBTNK7PI3A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/peru-protests-block-access-machu-picchu-stranding-tourists-2024-01-29/Lucinda Elliott世界美洲
